entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
